main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 20 April 1952 in Hallingdal, Norway, involving a single ball-shaped object that displayed erratic high-speed movements and stopped in mid-air.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 25 minutes,The object was described as ball-shaped,Multiple reports from Project Blue Book document sightings in Hallingdal,Witnesses included civilians and a pastor,The object emitted no sound during its flight.
